Features that Improve Your Score

PrepScholar is way more than just a set of questions and video lessons. Our program customizes your learning to your strengths and weaknesses. With PrepScholar, you'll make more progress in less time than with any other program

Customization

Our smart diagnostic figures out your true skill level and builds a custom prep program that caters to your difficulty level. You'll make the fastest progress

Read more
Clear Guidance

We give you exact step-by-step instructions on what to study: which lessons to take, when to take practice tests, and how to review your mistakes

Read more
Motivation

With weekly reports, progress trackers, and customized feedback, we motivate you to make more progress. You'll study more with PrepScholar

Read more

Your Study Plan, Hour by Hour

PrepScholar guides you step by step through your prep program. Never get overwhelmed by SAT prep again

Take a Smart Diagnostic

Hours 2-10

Hours 15+

Ace the SAT

Top Quality Videos in Select Lessons

Many lessons have included videos to show you the content and strategies you need to ace the SAT. These high-quality videos supplement our interactive lessons to carefully explain the most difficult concepts.

But unlike many other programs, we're much more than a collection of videos. Check out our other features to find out more!

Click play to see a math video excerpt.

Add 1-on-1 tutoring
to your prep

Is getting the highest possible SAT score your top goal? Then you should add on 1-on-1 tutoring with our Complete + Tutoring package. You'll get 12 hours of premium tutoring integrated into your Complete Prep experience.

This provides you with the best of both worlds: unlimited practice on our online platform, and a 1-on-1 human expert to ensure every last concept and question is understood.

Learn more about tuturing

Have any questions about our program?

Consult our FAQ, where we tell you how to get started and more details about how PrepScholar works.
